chapter.title: Release Notes for version 3.2.02004
chapter.para: This release is a patch for version 3.2.01081 which contains updates to the documentation.

listitem.para: The software license has been updated.
You can read the new license in the installation directory in the guidancer folder.
The standard shortcut to collect objects from an AUT in the Object Mapping Mode is now: Â»Ctrl+Shift+Q. You can see and change this shortcut in the preferences.
